increased_productivity.body: With clear communication, you can focus on what matters, be better organized and provide better replies.

stress_free.body: timyo ends the pressure of the automatic ASAP email status quo, making all email less stressful.

clear_expectations.body: Not all emails are created equal. Many don't need an answer. Most can wait until tomorrow. Choose when you would like a response and what kind of response you’re looking for.

clear_priorities.body: With Timyo, recipients know exactly what senders are looking for as soon as they see an email. As a Timyo user, you don't even need to open your email to know when and how to deal with it.

schedule_email.body: Shifting between tasks kills our productivity. Even taking a minute to respond to an email pulls your focus and distracts you from everything else you’ve got going on.
